description:
Pay attention this is without a doubt the plan. 
There is already patents for digital covid vaccine IDs (look into ID2020)
This is how they ease you into the idea by slowly (tiptoeing) towards an end goal.

The Totalitarian Tiptoe is the World Domination method of slow encroachment on civil liberties and freedoms, used by a small few that want to control the world. The Totalitarian Tiptoe involves small, easily-accepted (and less noticable) steps to achieve a pre-desired endpoint that would otherwise be totally discarded by the general populace of the world. The favoured Modus Operandi of those that plan a Totalitarian Tiptoe is the Problem-Reaction-Solution formula.

The inevitable endpoint is that of a unified fascist World Government (to stomp out national sovereignty in the name of 'peace'), a World Bank (to control the world's nations economically and cripple their independance by forcing them to use a centrally-controlled World Currency), policed by a World Army, and a Microchipped Population of mind-controlled slaves.

The Totalitarian Tiptoe does not involve one or even any less than a dozen different desired solutions (Using the Problem-Reaction-Solution formula), but thousands of small steps in the bringing about of previously unconsidered options (due to a complete lack of human comprehension of the neccesity for them, and a previous lack of problems to react to and DESIRE the solution in the first place).

Repost @let_them_feel_our_movement_11 

#covidvaccine #newworldorder #bigbrother #surveillancestate #1984 #totalitarianism #gerogeorwell #billgates #id2020 #agenda2030 #bigpharma #rfidchip #microchip
